name: Sylphia Island
description:
Sylphia Island is a Ren'Py Visual Novel. You follow your named MC as he adjusts to life on the island after a accident causing him to lose his memory. You're taken into the home of Alex, a matriarchal figure who cares for 4 girls, Celeste, Lillian, Gracie, and Serra. 

Currently there are 6 events. A story one you play through, then 5 events you get to find, 2 are in the morning, 2 in the afternoon, and 1 in the evening. 

This is a passion project for me, and updates are rapidly coming. The game is free, but if you wish to support me, and get early access to the MAJOR content releases (v.1, v.2, v.3, etc) check out my patreon. 

SYLPHIA ISLAND IS CURRENTLY UNDERGOING A ENTIRE GRAPHICS REHAUL EXPECTED TO TAKE 2 TO 3 DAYS. ----
All scenes are being reshot, with a higher quality renderer and are being reposed. The final product will be a much higher quality presentation. It will be posted as soon as its completed
